mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore shaking hands with Airman Marion Mussili
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. shaking hands with Airman Marion L. Mussili after their arrival at MATS (Military Air Transport Service) Terminal, Andrews Air Force Base, Maryland from Europe. Moore interceded in the confinement of Airmen Mussili by the Greek Government after his conviction for hitting a pedestrian with a military vehicle. Moore then brought the airman back to the states with him.
